channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Still Need to Be Heard in Washington
item.description: The mixed record of the second Trump administration and the GOP Congress on life suggests that pro-lifers still have work to do in Washington.

item.title: House Republicans call Minnesota fraud probe 'tip of the iceberg' as more blue states face scrutiny
item.description: GOP lawmakers push to expand the Minnesota welfare fraud probe to California, New York, Illinois after alleged billions were lost, which Minnesota off...

item.title: Like Don Lemon, Our Entire Corporate Press Is Literally Just Doing Far-Left Activism
item.description: The corporate media apparatus proves time and time again that it is merely a communication arm of the left.

item.title: It’s Time to Ditch ‘Disparate Impact Theory’ — and Biden’s Weaponization of Civil Rights Law
item.description: HUD has proposed a rule to end the agency’s use of this pernicious legal doctrine.

item.title: The curious case of the ICE pastor as Minnesota protesters disrupt church services and DOJ launches investigation
item.description: "To have someone serving as a pastor who oversees these ICE agents, is almost unfathomable to me,” said Nekima Levy Armstrong, a reverend herself.

item.title: Trump says he wants Greenland because he was rejected for a Nobel Peace Prize last year
item.description: The president revealed his motivation in a text message to Norway's Prime Minister, who has no say over Nobel awards.

item.title: Only Government Force Can Stop Democrats From Plunging America Into Darkness
item.description: Democrats created the situation America finds itself in, and only a forceful crackdown on leftist anarchy will restore cultural stability.

item.title: Noem hammers Walz, Frey for ignoring 1,360 ICE detainers for criminal illegal aliens
item.description: The DHS accused Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz and Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey of protecting criminals after arresting 10,000 illegal immigrants on Monday.

item.title: Trump’s Gaza ‘Board of Peace’ extends invitations to Russia, Belarus and Thailand along with EU
item.description: It's unclear how many leaders have been invited to join the board.

item.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
item.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.

item.description: PwC's Mohamed Kande talked to Fortune about the "tri-modal mandate" for leaders to execute, transform and build: "I've not seen that in 25 years."

item.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
item.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

item.title: The World Economic Forum Is A Glorified HOA For Leftist ‘Experts’ And Rich Communists
item.description: The World Economic Forum has become a globalist deep state with tentacles reaching the highest levels of government throughout the West.

item.title: It’s Way Past Time to Retire the International Space Station
item.description: With sky-high costs for minimal returns, the ISS has failed on both the geopolitical and scientific research fronts.
